org.apache.struts.taglib.html

Class XhtmlTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • org.apache.struts.taglib.html.XhtmlTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IterationTag, Tag

    public class XhtmlTag
extends TagSupport
    This tag tells all other html taglib tags to render themselves in xhtml. Its presence in a page turns on xhtml.

    Example:
    <html:xhtml/>

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
